alert.note: Alert for Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 11 at 8:48PM EDT until July 13 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in North Carolina... Northeast Cape Fear River Near Burgaw affecting Pender County. For the Northeast Cape Fear River...including Burgaw...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON THURSDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Northeast Cape Fear River Near Burgaw. * WHEN...Until early Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Water affects the lowest portions of River Bend Road and River Birch Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM EDT Tuesday the stage was 7.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 8.0 feet tomorrow morning. - Advisory stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=ilm . The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning.
